text:
[Verse]
Lights are shining bright
Feet are moving tight
Feel the rhythm flow
With the night aglow

[Verse 2]
Stars are in the sky
Colors flying high
Take my hand and dance
In this wild romance

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Everything feels just right
Hearts are beating so fast
Making memories last

[Verse 3]
Night is ours to own
In this twilight zone
Spinning round and round
Feel the magic found

[Bridge]
Whispers in the breeze
Moments like these
Hold them close tonight
Under the pale starlight

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Everything feels just right
Hearts are beating so fast
Making memories last
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
